name: Punching Things!
description:
Punching Things! is a procedurally generated, beat’em’up about robots who punch each other try try to stay alive. In the game you will play as Clunk, a robot who is forced to destroy other robots to survive in a gladiatorial arena. Every robot will have unique statistics and behaviors. Every robot will be a new character to interact with.

Keyboard
Use WASD to Move
J is Light Punch
K is Heavy Punch
L is Throw
Space is Dodge

Controller
Use Left Stick to Move
X is Light Punch
Y is Heavy Punch
B is Throw
A is Dodge
